"It worked for magnetto!":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zbTyTyizz1s

If I could control water I would just pop goku's brain.

If I had ice powers I would just freeze his blood.

If I could control emotions I would just remove his anger to de-supersaiyan him and cause him to feel depression to death. . yes it is possible for someone to be depressed so much that they die.


You have to admit though; Goku may have been a idiot, but the villains were bigger idiots to fight him fairly.
